document.full_text: u.s. director terrence malick's long-awaited film "the tree of life" won the palme d'or prize for best picture at the cannes film festival on sunday.
document.title: malick's "the tree of life" wins palme d'or at cannes
lines_and_colors: u.s. director terrence malick's long-awaited film "the tree of life" won the palme d'or prize for best picture at the cannes film festival on sunday.
